hopobject.name: Minix3 support
hopobject.body: Porting Minix3 (www.minix3.org) to beagleboard & developing necessary drivers for the same. Minix3 is a highly reliable operating system. Currently it only runs on x86 hardware, but some work has been done to get it running on ARM.
hopobject.shortdesc: Porting Minix3 (www.minix3.org) to beagleboard & developing necessary drivers for beagle board.Minix3 is a highly reliable operating system. Currently it only runs on x86 hardware, but some work has been done to get it running on ARM.
